internal.content: --- title: Lava Commands description: --- export const Title = () => ( Lava Commands ); ; Lava Commands unlock a whole new level of functionality directly inside of Lava. Cache Entity Commands Execute Javascript Search SQL Interactions ## Quick Reference - `cache` - `Entity` - `EntityById` - `EntityByIds` - `EntityByDataview` - `EntityCount` - `Execute` - `JS` - `JS-url` - `search` - `sql` - `stylesheet` - `webrequest` - `interaction-cc` - `interaction` - `workflowactivate` ## Cache ``` {%- cache key:'variable' duration:'3600' twopass:'false' tags:'tag,list,optional' -%} {%- endcache -%} ``` ---- ## Entity Commands ### Entity Create entity commands in just a few keystrokes! 1. EntityByID 2. EntityByIds 3. EntityByDataview 4. EntityCount ``` {%- entityname where:'conditions' limit:'10' iterator:'Items' -%} {%- for item in Items -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- endentityname -%} ``` ---- ### EntityById ``` {%- entityname id:'100' securityenabled:'false' -%} {{ entityname. }} {%- endentityname -%} ``` #### Tabstops 1. Entity Name 2. Id 3. Security Enabled (false/true) 4. Output Property ---- ### EntityByIds ``` {%- entityname ids:'3,4,5' iterator:'Items' -%} {%- for item in Items -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- endentityname -%} ``` #### Tabstops 1. Entity Name 2. Ids 3. Iterator 4. Security Enabled (false/true) 5. Item Name 6. Output Property ---- ### EntityByDataview ``` {%- entityname dataview:'3' iterator:'Items' -%} {%- for item in Items -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- endentityname -%} ``` #### Tabstops 1. Entity Name 2. Dataview Id 3. Iterator 4. Security Enabled (false/true) 5. Item Name 6. Output Property ---- ### EntityCount ``` {%- entityname where:'conditions' count:'true' -%} {%- assign entitynameCount = count -%} {%- endentityname -%} ``` #### Tabstops 1. Entity Name 2. Conditions 3. Count Variable Name ---- ## Execute ``` {%- execute -%} {%- endexecute -%} ``` ---- ## Javascript ### JS ``` {%- javascript -%} {%- endjavascript -%} ``` ### JS-url ``` {%- javascript url:'https://' id:'uniqueid' -%}{%- endjavascript -%} ``` ## Search ``` {%- search query:'variable' entities'person,group' limit:'50' offset:'0' searchtype:'exactmatch' -%} {%- for item in results -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- endsearch -%} ``` ---- ## SQL #### Prefix `sql` ``` {%- sql return:'listvariable' -%} {%- endsql -%} {% for item in listvariable %} {% endfor %} ``` #### Tabstops 1. List Variable 2. SQL Command 3. Lava Output ---- ## Stylesheet ---- ## Web Request #### Prefix `webrequest` #### Snippet ``` {%- webrequest url:'https://api.github.com/repos/SparkDevNetwork/Rock/commits' -%} {%- for item in results -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- endwebrequest -%} ``` #### Tabstops 1. URL 2. Content ---- ## Interactions ### Interaction Content Channel Item Write ``` {% interactioncontentchannelitemwrite contentchannelitemid:'1' operation:'View' summary:'Viewed content channel item #1' personaliasid:'10' %} ``` ### Interaction Write ``` {% interactionwrite channeltypemediumvalueid:'1' channelentityid:'1' channelname:'Some Channel' componententitytypeid:'1' interactionentitytypeid:'1' componententityid:'1' componentname:'Some Component' entityid:'1' operation:'View' summary:'Viewed Some Page' relatedentitytypeid:'1' relatedentityid:'1' channelcustom1:'Some Custom Value' channelcustom2:'Another Custom Value' channelcustomindexed1:'Some Indexed Custom Value' personaliasid:'10' %} Here is the interaction data. {% endinteractionwrite %} ``` ---- ## Workflow Activate ``` {% workflowactivate workflowtype:'workflowId' %} Activated new workflow with the id of #{{ Workflow.Id }}. {% endworkflowactivate %} ```

Content ---- ## Interactions ### Interaction Content Channel Item Write ``` {% interactioncontentchannelitemwrite contentchannelitemid:'1' operation:'View' summary:'Viewed content channel item #1' personaliasid:'10' %} ``` ### Interaction Write ``` {% interactionwrite channeltypemediumvalueid:'1' channelentityid:'1' channelname:'Some Channel' componententitytypeid:'1' interactionentitytypeid:'1' componententityid:'1' componentname:'Some Component' entityid:'1' operation:'View' summary:'Viewed Some Page' relatedentitytypeid:'1' relatedentityid:'1' channelcustom1:'Some Custom Value' channelcustom2:'Another Custom Value' channelcustomindexed1:'Some Indexed Custom Value' personaliasid:'10' %} Here is the interaction data. {% endinteractionwrite %} ``` ---- ## Workflow Activate ``` {% workflowactivate workflowtype:'workflowId' %} Activated new workflow with the id of #{{ Workflow.Id }}. {% endworkflowactivate %} ```
